T02D1856:36a-1: tsa tu r'am ga s'a dha n'am no pi ka sa manta bha dr'i n'a ma /
T02D1856:36a-3: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo zhes bya ba /
T02D1856:36a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:36a-5: dpal ldan 'khrul pa kun bsal dri ma med pa yi //
T02D1856:36a-6: gzi brjid mtha' yas rigs kyi sprul pas rnam brgyan pa //
T02D1856:36a-7: shes rab ma yis lus 'khyud mdzes pas klubs pa gang //
T02D1856:36a-8: 'jam dpal de la de mchod don dngos cho ga 'di bshad bya //
T02D1856:36a-9: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i tshul gyis dam pa'i bshes gnyen gsol gdab byed brod pas //
T02D1856:36a-10: 'gro ba'i don kun phun sum tshogs gzhi dngos po cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1856:36a-11: skabs ldan g-yo ba 'di dang dam pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs shin tu thob dka' 'jig rten la //
T02D1856:36a-12: de phyir thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin byed 'dod sems ni mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02D1856:36a-13: de nas snying rje'i mthu las byung ba'i byang chub yid ldan gsang sngags pa //
T02D1856:36b-0: gtong ba @36b la sogs yon tan brgyad pa zab mo'i tshul la mos pa'am //
T02D1856:36b-1: dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor cho gas shin tu dbang bskur phun sum ldan //
T02D1856:36b-2: cho ga bzhin du lung stsal thob pa bzhi sngags bsnyen pa blo ldan pas //
T02D1856:36b-3: gang zhig dri med chu sogs ljon shing mchog gi phreng ba klubs pa yi //
T02D1856:36b-4: goms pa'i ri la bcom ldan 'jam dbyangs zhes bya rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02D1856:36b-5: dang po tho rangs snying ga'i dbus su dri med 'od 'phro de nyid bsam //
T02D1856:36b-6: bkod nas snying rje can gyis sgo la sogs pa yang dag par yang bya //
T02D1856:36b-7: dam pa'i tsandan sogs bkrus dri zhim me tog bkram pa'i mchog cha la //
T02D1856:36b-8: bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i gnas su 'dug nas dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1856:36b-9: dmigs te sna tshogs mchod sprin spro sogs sngon du byas nas blo ldan pas //
T02D1856:36b-10: sdig pa la sogs 'di ltar bya'o dge ba 'phel don du //
T02D1856:36b-11: thog ma med ldan srid pa'i rgyun la rtog pas bsags pa'i sdig kun gang //
T02D1856:36b-12: snying rje chen po'i mdun rim bzhin te thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D1856:36b-13: yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams mdzad pa'i dge ba gang //
T02D1856:36b-14: ma lus bdag gis yi rang yang dag de ni byang chub phyir bsngo'o //
T02D1856:36b-15: sems rgyas zla ba dri ma med las grub pas mtha' yas snying rje gnas //
T02D1856:36b-16: bdag gi yid la gnas pa'i bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D1856:36b-17: rtog pa kun las nges grol ma lus dam pa sems dpa'i bkra shis gzhi //
T02D1856:36b-18: dngos po kun gyi ngo bor chos la bdag nyid skyabs su mchi //
T02D1856:36b-19: bcings pas yang dag spangs pa'i snying rje mchog gis drangs pa'i dpal ldan pa //
T02D1856:36b-20: rab dga' la sogs sa la gnas pa dam bcas tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1856:36b-21: bsam pa rnam smin dag pas sgrib kun bag chags ma lus bcom pa ste //
T02D1856:36b-22: mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1856:36b-23: bde gshegs sras bcas lam gcig sbyin sogs bcu po dkar po yon tan ngo bo la //
T02D1856:36b-24: rdzogs sangs rgyas dag kun gyi rang bzhin blo yis de ltar bsten par bgyi //
T02D1856:36b-25: 'jig rten 'di dag lta ba'i dra bas bkab la snying rjes dmigs nas su //
T02D1856:36b-26: yang dag byang chub sems kyi gzhal med bsgom rim 'di ni sngags pas bya //
T02D1856:36b-27: stong pa rang bzhin med phyir rgyu 'bras phyir ni rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
T02D1856:37a-1: su dpag pa bsal bas ma lus gzhi yi smon pa nges bral lo //
T02D1856:37a-2: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1856:37a-3: de 'og ston zla dkar bo mtha' med phyogs 'khor gnas pa sna tshogs 'od //
T02D1856:37a-4: 'phags par gnas pa'i gru gsum nang gi mkha' yi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1856:37a-5: chos kyi 'byung zhes phyag rgya dbus gnas padma sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan //
T02D1856:37a-6: h'um gis rdo rje brgyan pa'i sa la kun du bzang po las byung bsgom //
T02D1856:37a-7: bhr'um yig 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad skur gyur pa //
T02D1856:37a-8: gsal ba thub dbang dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'od zer gyis khyab phyogs 'khor kun //
T02D1856:37a-9: gru bzhi mnyam pa'i phyir na mchog bzhis dran pa dbang po sgo rnams kyis //
T02D1856:37a-10: bsam gtan bzhi yi tva ra na ting 'dzin mu khyud bzhi yis yongs bskor ba //
T02D1856:37a-11: mu khyud de la gnas pa dam pa'i mchod pas 'brel ba'i gzugs rnams rgyun //
T02D1856:37a-12: sna tshogs rgyan rnams bkod pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs phyir ;
T02D1856:37a-13: /'dul bas bskyod pa gsung rab yan lag dgu yi dam chos kun 'gro ci yi phyir //
T02D1856:37a-14: rlung gis bskyod pa rgyal mtshan phreng dang dril sgra grag pas phyogs sgo kun //
T02D1856:37a-15: me long ye shes rtag tu dri med byang chub yan lag me tog sbos bkram zhing //
T02D1856:37a-16: dra ba dra phyed me long me tog phreng ba sna tshogs brgyan pa'i gzugs //
T02D1856:37a-17: rnam par thar brgyad rnam par dag pas ka ba
T02D1856:37a-18: brgyad kyis klubs pa'i mchog / rdo rje tshul gyis
T02D1856:37a-19: chos kyi 'khor los sgyur phyir rdo rje'i thig ldan
T02D1856:37a-20: la // gzugs la sogs pa'i spyod yul dag pas bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
T02D1856:37a-21: zas lngas brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun //
T02D1856:37a-22: sna tshogs padma la gnas nyi ma zla bar bcas pa lha yi gdan //
T02D1856:37a-23: ma lus rin chen bkod pa'i gzhal yas brtsegs pa de la bsgom //
T02D1856:37a-24: bcu drug cha shas sde pa las byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ba yi dbus //
T02D1856:37a-25: dbus kyi gdan la cho ga bzhin du 'od dpag med gzhi bsam par bya //
T02D1856:37a-26: mchog gi dang po'i snying po las byung rdo rje dam pa ye shes gzugs //
T02D1856:37a-27: grangs med thug pa'i 'od zer phreng bas grub pa'i phyogs sgo kun //
T02D1856:37a-28: bsams nas dang po'i snying por bcas pa'i nga rgyal ldan pas sbrul pa mtha' yas kyis //
T02D1856:37b-0: 'gro ba'i don mchog rab mdzad pa yi thugs mchog rdul phran rnam bkod gzugs @37b brnyan can //
T02D1856:37b-1: g-yas g-yon zhal ni gnag dang dmar po zla ba
T02D1856:37b-2: rdzogs ltar dkar ba'i mdog / gsal bas rnam par
T02D1856:37b-3: bkod pas brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i rig ma
T02D1856:37b-4: 'khyud // lhag ma'i phyag zung gnyis brgyan rdo rje ral gri rin chen padma 'dzin //
T02D1856:37b-5: 'jig rten gsum khong brgyan pa'i 'od zer rnam pa bde 'gro thub pa'i dbang //
T02D1856:37b-6: rnam thar gsum dag shes rab bdag nyid snying rje'i mchog gi thabs ldan pas //
T02D1856:37b-7: 'gro kun de nyid gcig pa rgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon sum bya //
T02D1856:37b-8: mchog tu rjes chags phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten thams cad 'dul dmigs nas //
T02D1856:37b-9: dga' ba'i rdzu 'phrul sgra yis rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams rang gi lus nang bzhugs //
T02D1856:37b-10: de ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs sogs yul gyi rang bzhin pas //
T02D1856:37b-11: phyung nas rig ma thams cad gzhi yi rig ma'i nang du thim par bya //
T02D1856:37b-12: de yi padma'i snying po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor dri med zla 'od las byung ba //
T02D1856:37b-13: blo yis bsams nas rdzogs par bde la skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya //
T02D1856:37b-14: dam pa gsang ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam snang mdzad sogs rgyal ba'i rgyan zhugs nas //
T02D1856:37b-15: zla ba zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas dbang bskur byas te de 'og tu //
T02D1856:37b-16: sa snying phyag na rdo rje nam snying 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib pa sel //
T02D1856:37b-17: dpal ldan kun du bzang po de dag mig la sogs pa'i grangs su gyur //
T02D1856:37b-18: gzugs sgra de dang ro dang reg bya chos dbyings rdo rje yang //
T02D1856:37b-19: sa chu me rlung rang bzhin gyur pa spyan la sogs pa'i grangs 'gyur ro //
T02D1856:37b-20: gzugs dang myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid brjod pas //
T02D1856:37b-21: rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs rnams te de 'og sa bon gyis dbyung bya //
T02D1856:37b-22: kshim dzr'im kham gam shkam sam brjod pa de dag mig la sogs rnams so //
T02D1856:37b-23: myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid brjod pa //
T02D1856:37b-24: rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D1856:37b-25: kham ram brjod pas gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs
T02D1856:37b-26: so // lam m'am pam t'am zhes kyang gsungs pa de bzhin spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1856:37b-27: bhr'um a'am dzr'im h'um zhes pas rtag pa la sogs so //
T02D1856:37b-28: aom a'a: h'um zhes sems 'bar ho yi bar du zhugs pa cho ga bzhin //
T02D1856:37b-29: padma'i nang gnas mnyam med shes rab chags pas zhu ba byed mthong ste //
T02D1856:37b-30: de yi 'od kyi mthu yis kyang ni zla ba zhu bar byed mthong ste //
T02D1856:38a-1: sogs pa'i lha mo'i dbyangs kyi sgra yis bskul bar bsam /
T02D1856:38a-2: sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02D1856:38a-3: dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D1856:38a-4: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1856:38a-5: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38a-6: rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan //
T02D1856:38a-7: sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog sgrub rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02D1856:38a-8: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1856:38a-9: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38a-10: khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan pa'i thugs brtse ba //
T02D1856:38a-11: 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson //
T02D1856:38a-12: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1856:38a-13: spyod pa dri med kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1856:38a-14: khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02D1856:38a-15: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa //
T02D1856:38a-16: mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gsol par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1856:38a-17: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1856:38a-18: de ltar dbyangs kyis bskul bas sgyu 'phrul dra bar dngos kun legs bsams nas //
T02D1856:38a-19: 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba'i gzhi yi sngags kyis lus su rang bsgyur bya //
T02D1856:38a-20: de la 'od kyis ma lus lha rnams rgyal ba'i thub dbang rnams //
T02D1856:38a-21: nang du thim nas 'od kyis dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur par bya //
T02D1856:38a-22: gur kum mchog 'od dmar 'dra g-yas g-yon zhal ni
T02D1856:38a-23: gnag dang dkar ba'i mdog / sna tshogs rgyan gyis
T02D1856:38a-24: brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud //
T02D1856:38a-25: gsal ba'i ral gri mda' dang autpala mthing ga gzhu ni mtha' yas 'od //
T02D1856:38a-26: ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' kun dkyil 'khor ldan skyob pa //
T02D1856:38a-27: gzung 'dzin bral bas dngos po thams cad ngo bo nyid med shes nas su //
T02D1856:38a-28: rnam par byang ba mngon bzhugs zab don byin rlabs 'di ltar bya //
T02D1856:38a-29: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1856:38a-30: de 'og gzhi yi sa bon 'od kyis ji ltar rang la gang ste mig sogs rnams //
T02D1856:38b-0: sa snying la sogs dri med rang snying zla ba'i rdo rje bum @38b pa'i dkyil gnas pa //
T02D1856:38b-1: h'um gi thugs kyi rdo rje kha dang mgo la padma 'khor lo'i dkyil du yang //
T02D1856:38b-2: a'a: dang phyag mtshan gnyis kyis gsung gi rdo rje sku yi rdo rje'ang bsam par bya //
T02D1856:38b-3: de thugs 'od zer rgyun gyis rang gi shes rab dang sbyor snang bas kun du ni //
T02D1856:38b-4: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la mchod nas thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab //
T02D1856:38b-5: dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1856:38b-6: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1856:38b-7: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas //
T02D1856:38b-8: thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-9: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1856:38b-10: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //
T02D1856:38b-11: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas //
T02D1856:38b-12: thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1856:38b-14: dpal ldan chos kyi gsung gi lam //
T02D1856:38b-15: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1856:38b-16: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas //
T02D1856:38b-17: gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-18: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1856:38b-19: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1856:38b-20: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas //
T02D1856:38b-21: gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1856:38b-23: dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1856:38b-24: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1856:38b-25: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas ;
T02D1856:38b-26: / sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-27: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1856:38b-28: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1856:38b-29: de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas //
T02D1856:38b-30: sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol //
T02D1856:38b-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1856:38b-32: rdo rje gsum ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshan ma spangs pa mtshon byas te //
T02D1856:38b-33: sems kyi 'od zer rnams kyis bskul nas thams cad tshogs su gyur pa'i thub pa'i sde //
T02D1856:38b-34: thub mchog 'od zer las byung rig ma'i tshogs kyis yang dag 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1856:38b-35: bum pa'i ye shes chu yis blugs pas rang rig gtso bo snang bas dbu brgyan gyur //
T02D1856:38b-36: de bzhin rang gi lha mo 'dra bar rang gi snying po'ang bsgoms nas rig mar sprul //
T02D1856:38b-37: mig la sogs pa gang nas yig 'bru gsum bkod 'bar ba'i lus ldan pa //
T02D1856:38b-38: 'og snying lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis sogs la de nyid shes par bya //
T02D1856:39a-0: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a zhes bya bas lus yid rdo rje dam pa'i @39a * //
T02D1856:39a-2: de lnga'i byin rlabs lus ni 'gro gsum khyab pas dam pa'i 'od tshogs bsam //
T02D1856:39a-3: a'a: sa bskyed rnam par bkod pa'i snying po h'um las sbrul pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
T02D1856:39a-4: padma'i shes rab rgyu mthun rang bzhin thabs dang bcas par gyur pa'i gzhi yi lus bsngags pa //
T02D1856:39a-5: de dang lhan cig bde gshegs rnams la rjes su chags par bgyi zhes brtsams //
T02D1856:39a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1856:39a-7: sems kyi zla ba'i 'od kyis ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs ni bzhugs gnas te //
T02D1856:39a-8: h'um gi rdo rjer byung nas dri med padma la gnas dam pa'i yid kyi gzugs //
T02D1856:39a-9: bsams nas rang gi snying pos bskyed pa thams cad gzhi yi dkyil 'khor lha gzugs su //
T02D1856:39a-10: mtshag gi rjes su dkar mo zhes par mtha' yas yon tan rin chen ma //
T02D1856:39a-11: rin chen dbang phyug dra ba'i dngos bo sgrol ba badzra ra t'i zhes bskul bas //
T02D1856:39a-12: dri med rin chen phreng bas bsgoms pa'i phyogs 'khor byed ma dbang ldan la //
T02D1856:39a-13: dam pa'i 'khor lo autpala dmar po padma autpala ser po rnams kyis mtshan //
T02D1856:39a-14: de dag gi ni rim pa'i nges pa'i lhag ma'i ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag bsnams yin //
T02D1856:39a-15: dkyil 'khor grva bzhi dang ni shar gyi sgo gnyis la ni bsam bya ba //
T02D1856:39a-16: gzugs sogs rdo rje lha mo sku la sogs dang gsum gyis so //
T02D1856:39a-17: shar gyi sgo ru grags pa bsam pa thams cad 'grub mtha' yas pas 'jigs pa'i 'od //
T02D1856:39a-18: 'bar la ya m'anta kri ta ces bas zad dus drag sprin dkyil 'khor dngos po ste //
T02D1856:39a-19: thugs bdag rgyal po mnyam pa'i sku ni du ma'i khro bo rigs kyi 'od phyung ba //
T02D1856:39a-20: gshin rje mthar byed ces bya mi bzad pa yi sbrul gyis sku brgyan dpal ldan pa'o //
T02D1856:39a-21: lho phyogs kyi sgor gnas pa pradzny'anta kri ta ces pas bla na med ldan pa //
T02D1856:39a-22: sku yi dbang phyug bzhin du phyag la sogs pa drag po gzhan gyis mi thub gsal //
T02D1856:39a-23: de nas rta mgrin nub kyi phyogs su sgo ru 'od zer 'khrigs pas phyogs bskor ba //
T02D1856:39a-24: padm'anta kri ta ces pas 'bar ba'i 'jig pa'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1856:39a-25: gsung gi bzhin du phyag la sogs pa du mas sdang ba 'jigs byed zhal //
T02D1856:39a-26: gad sgrogs bzhad pas ri rnams g-yo bar byed dang thub pa'i dbang rnams so //
T02D1856:39a-27: de nas mi bskyod 'dra ba'i zhal sogs bishn'a nta kri ta ces bya byang sgo ru //
T02D1856:39b-0: zad dus byin za lta bu @39b 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dpa' ba'o //
T02D1856:39b-1: rnam snang mdzad dang thub dbang snang ba mtha' yas thugs kyi dbang phyug dbu rgyan dang //
T02D1856:39b-2: rim par tho ba be con padma rdo rje la sogs phyag kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1856:39b-3: de ltar rdzogs par bskyed par dkyil 'khor mthong nas dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02D1856:39b-4: snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyus bde gshegs spyan drangs bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:39b-5: thabs dang shes rab dngos bo dri med ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bde bas gsang bar ni //
T02D1856:39b-6: dkyil 'khor bsams te de nas thar byed la sogs bsrung byas nas //
T02D1856:39b-7: rang snying bzlas pa'i tsandan sogs dang me tog mdzes pa phul te thim //
T02D1856:39b-8: rang dang 'dra ba'i cho gas dbang bskur byas nas 'di ltar nan tan mchod par bya //
T02D1856:39b-9: padma'i nang gi rang gi sa bon 'od kyis drangs nas gzugs sogs thams cad ni //
T02D1856:39b-10: padma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor yang dag byang chub yid kyi sa bon bsam par bya //
T02D1856:39b-11: shes rab so so'i ba spu'i las byung sna tshogs rnam pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i tshogs //
T02D1856:39b-12: ma lus khyab pa'i mkha' gzhi thams cad de nas blo dang ldan pas spro bar bya //
T02D1856:39b-13: 'od zer sgo nas byung ba'i dri med thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan sku dang //
T02D1856:39b-14: me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod dang na bza' chos 'byung la sogs dang //
T02D1856:39b-15: mtshan ma rnams kyi rim pas mdzes pas ldem bag phyag ni lo ma 'od dang bcas //
T02D1856:39b-16: gsal ba'i 'od zer sbrul pa mang po sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rnams 'byung dang //
T02D1856:39b-17: sgyu ma la sogs dra ba'i dngos po so so yang dag rig pa'i 'jig rten lta dge dang //
T02D1856:39b-18: rtog pa thams cad nges grol mchog gi bde ba 'byung rgyu'i dngos ldan pa'i //
T02D1856:39b-19: gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis de bzhin phyi ma'i dri sogs thams cad kyis //
T02D1856:39b-20: dbye ba'i rtog pa grol bas rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la yang dag mchod par bya //
T02D1856:39b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1856:39b-22: de yi 'og tu sgra brnyan 'dra bar sgra yul thams cad la ni yod bsams na //
T02D1856:39b-23: rang yid rig pa'i lha yi stod pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes su gsungs //
T02D1856:39b-24: gzugs la sogs pa gcig min rdul phran cha yang
T02D1856:39b-25: ma mthong du ma'i gzugs kyang ma yin zhes pa'ang
T02D1856:39b-26: de bzhin no // yan lag med pa'i rdul phran
T02D1856:39b-27: nyid la du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rjes 'brang
T02D1856:40a-0: de bzhin no // med phyir dang // sa yi dkyil 'khor la @40a * //
T02D1856:40a-1: sogs gzugs kyi dbye bas de la 'ga' yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1856:40a-2: de bas 'dzin pa la sogs bral bas rang dbang gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags ngo bo yin //
T02D1856:40a-3: ma lus g-yo dang mi g-yo'i dngos bo dri za'i grong khyer dag dang 'dra ba yin //
T02D1856:40a-4: bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rtog pa'i rgyun gyi ngo bos 'khor ba 'di dag ste //
T02D1856:40a-5: dag pa yang ni de las ldog pa'i ngo bo tsam la rnam par shes par bya //
T02D1856:40a-6: chos nyid kyis ni srid dang zhi ba'i ngo bo 'dir ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med //
T02D1856:40a-7: ci'i phyir 'dzin pa la sogs rnam par bral ba rtag tu kun la sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1856:40a-8: thams cad 'ga' yang med de so sor snang ba'i rang bzhin rtog pa las //
T02D1856:40a-9: sems las gzhan du gyur pa'i nga zhes 'ga' yang med de de phyir bdag kyang de //
T02D1856:40a-10: gang gi ngo bo gang yin de yis de nyid rtogs pa'i gzhi ste ci phyir dngos //
T02D1856:40a-11: de bas thams cad dbyer med shes te dngos po thams cad dbyer med ba nyid yin //
T02D1856:40a-12: kha cig yul dang kha cig gzhan du snang bar rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig gis //
T02D1856:40a-13: de dang de yi bral dang bral ba'i phyir te de phyis thams cad ma yin no //
T02D1856:40a-14: dang dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa de bzhin dran pa bsam gtan dag pas kyang //
T02D1856:40a-15: dam pa'i sgo srung gzugs te shes rab rnam par dag pas thams cad yul du snang //
T02D1856:40a-16: mtshan ma med pa'i dag pa thams cad dag pas lha mo tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang //
T02D1856:40a-17: thams cad don dang bdag po rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa rnam par dag pa yis //
T02D1856:40a-18: me long la sogs mkha' chen po //
T02D1856:40a-19: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1856:40a-20: rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:40a-21: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1856:40a-22: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1856:40a-23: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:40a-24: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1856:40a-25: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1856:40a-26: dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med //
T02D1856:40a-27: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:40a-29: me rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1856:40a-30: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1856:40a-31: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:40a-32: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1856:40a-33: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1856:40a-34: dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1856:40a-35: rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1856:40b-0: phyag 'tshal 'bar bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rlung me'i dkyil @40b 'khor gnas 'bar ba'i //
T02D1856:40b-1: bdud rtsi lnga la de nas 'bru gsum bzlas pa'i dkyil nas grangs med thub pa'i dbang //
T02D1856:40b-2: ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin brtsams te yi ge h'um bkod rdo rje dam pa'i lce //
T02D1856:40b-3: snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de yis tshim par bya //
T02D1856:40b-4: kun du 'khrul pa spangs pa'i snying gi 'od zer las byung thub dbang mtha' yas kyi //
T02D1856:40b-5: 'gro ba ma lus yang dag sangs rgyas byed pa bzhi yi sngags nang thim par bya //
T02D1856:40b-6: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par grol bas mngon sum gyis ni mthong min de 'dzin pa //
T02D1856:40b-7: gzung ba 'ga' yang med de gzhan yang yod pa ma yin 'brel pa ma mthong bas //
T02D1856:40b-8: sim pa la sogs rang gi las kyang 'ga' yang mthong de yongs bzung bas na //
T02D1856:40b-9: dus gcig 'brel bar gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du de dag gzung 'dzin med //
T02D1856:40b-10: dkar po la sogs gang gis dang por mthong ba de nyid dus gzhan mthong ba min //
T02D1856:40b-11: de gnyis phan tshun du yang mi mthun phyir na rtag tu sim la sogs pa bzhin //
T02D1856:40b-12: de nas bzlas pa byed 'dod sems kyis dngos kun bdag nyid rang sems bdag por ni //
T02D1856:40b-13: byas nas sems kyi 'od zer ldan pa bzhi yi sngags ni mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:40b-14: 'phro bas sngags kyi rgyal po gsal bar gtong dang dgag pa'i dbang du byas nas bzlas nas su //
T02D1856:40b-15: sku la sogs pa rnams kyi spro ba'i rim gyis sam ni dus gcig byas pa yis //
T02D1856:40b-16: nam mkha'i nang du sku la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis bkang bya ste //
T02D1856:40b-17: gong ma bzhin du sna tshogs mchod sprin tshogs rnams de nas kun du dbyung bar bya //
T02D1856:40b-18: mchog gi rig ma 'khyud pa bde ba chen po chags pas gzhan dbang mthong nas su //
T02D1856:40b-19: rgyas pa thub pa'i dbang po'i rgyun ni rang gi lus la mthar ni thim par bya //
T02D1856:40b-20: gzhi yi snying po de nyid sems dpas lus nyams zhan pas sems kyi spyod chung ba //
T02D1856:40b-21: rig ma mchog gi dbyangs kyis rab tu gsol ba btab nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
T02D1856:40b-22: dam pa'i sems kyi chu rgyun 'gags pa'i dbugs kyi 'od zer lcags kyus drangs nas su //
T02D1856:40b-23: lus nyam chung na cho ga bzhin du sku yi rdo rje sogs la dbab par bya //
T02D1856:40b-24: de ltar skad cig 'dug nas gong nas gsungs pa'i cho ga yis ni de bzhin nyid shes pas //
T02D1856:41a-0: dam pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pa @41a * //
T02D1856:41a-1: nyin mtshan med par bya'o sngags kyang ma 'dres pa'o //
T02D1856:41a-2: gsungs pa'i bstod dang mchod la sogs pa rdzogs par bskyed pa brtson pa'i sngags pa yis //
T02D1856:41a-3: phyag 'tshal la sogs bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sku la sogs par rtog pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1856:41a-4: de 'dra'i cho ga de nyid mthong bas sems can khams ni nges dgrol dmigs nas su //
T02D1856:41a-5: snying rjes 'gro la phan don brtan pa'i sems kyis
T02D1856:41a-6: cho ga 'di yis 'jig rten phan pa'i rgyu phyir
T02D1856:41a-7: 'byung bar bya // badzra dhrik ces bskul nas thugs
T02D1856:41a-8: kyi rdo rje 'gro ba'i don mchog byed pa ni
T02D1856:41a-9: 'byung bar bya // // g-yas g-yon zhal ni dkar
T02D1856:41a-10: dmar 'bar ba'i mthing ga dam pa nor bu 'dra
T02D1856:41a-11: ba'i mdog / mchog gi dang po bzhin du phyag
T02D1856:41a-12: dang ldan pa du ma'i mdog gi 'od kyi tshogs
T02D1856:41a-14: blo dang ldan pas dngos po kun gyis thim par
T02D1856:41a-16: dzi ka ces bskul ba'i rdo rje 'dzin ltar mdog
T02D1856:41a-18: shar gyi zla ba padma'i dbus su 'khor sogs mtshan pa de bzhin bsam //
T02D1856:41a-19: ratna dhrik ces lho ru rin chen dbang phyug zhal rnams gzhon nu'i mdog 'dra ba //
T02D1856:41a-20: btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba margad rin chen la sogs mdzes pa'i phyag drug pa //
T02D1856:41a-21: a'a ro li ka ces padma r'a ga bzhin du dmar la zhal gnyis de bzhin te //
T02D1856:41a-22: snang ba mtha' yas 'bar ba 'od ldan nub tu
T02D1856:41a-23: padma la sogs mtshan pa'i phyag / ma ra ga
T02D1856:41a-24: ta'i nor bu lta bu sngon bzhin la sogs phun
T02D1856:41a-26: byang du don yod ces pa pra dzny'a dhrik ces ral gril sogs rnam ldan pa //
T02D1856:41a-27: mdzes pa'i ral pa'i dbu rgyan sna tshogs rin chen 'od kyis rab brgyan pa //
T02D1856:41a-28: rig ma dang bcas lus can thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni bsam par bya //
T02D1856:41a-29: me yi phyogs mtshams su ni mo ha ra t'i zhes pas lha mo spyan mar gyur //
T02D1856:41a-30: bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas mchog gi
T02D1856:41a-31: 'jo sgeg sku yi rdo rje'i mdog / bden bral
T02D1856:41a-32: dag la sgeg mo thugs kyi dbang phyug lta bur
T02D1856:41a-33: mdzes pa'i zhal // dve sha ra t'i zhes pas
T02D1856:41a-34: dga' ba mchog tu spro ba m'a ma k'i zhes
T02D1856:41a-35: mdzes pa'i zhal // bya // ngag dbang dri med
T02D1856:41a-36: sku ni r'a ga ra t'i zhes ni re zhig
T02D1856:41a-37: mdzes pa'i zhal // bya // bsam pa la //
T02D1856:41a-38: sems kyi dri med ngo bo nyid pas sangs rgyas
T02D1856:41a-39: mdzes pa'i zhal // bya // bsam pa la //
T02D1856:41a-40: kun gyi gzugs // de nyid dag dang sbyor bas
T02D1856:41a-41: dkyil 'khor bdag po nyid du cher gnas de dag
T02D1856:41a-42: mdzes pa'i zhal // bya // bsam pa la //
T02D1856:41a-43: kun gyi gzugs // go // gzugs sogs 'khrul dang
T02D1856:41b-0: bral @41b bas dri med la sogs dngos grub pa'o
T02D1856:41b-1: mdzes pa'i zhal // bya // bsam pa la //
T02D1856:41b-2: kun gyi gzugs // go // // ser sna la
T02D1856:41b-3: sogs 'das pas grub pa'i pha rol phyin dang sa
T02D1856:41b-4: dang dkar ba'i chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1856:41b-5: rnam par rtog med bdag gzhan 'byung ba'i rkyen nyid rim pa la'o //
T02D1856:41b-6: zab cing rgya che nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid du ni sems pa'o //
T02D1856:41b-7: don dam par yang dbyer med dbyer med ma yin kha cig 'dod de gzhan phyir na //
T02D1856:41b-8: gzhan du gzung ba'i gnas med phyir dang de bzhin dbye sogs rtogs pa'i mi 'byor phyir //
T02D1856:41b-9: de ltar brtags nas zhi ba'i snying po dri med zla bar gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1856:41b-10: dam pa'i sngags kyi thig le'i gzugs su rang gi sems ni 'od ldan bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:41b-11: sems de'i 'od zer phreng bas sku gsung rdo rje mchog gi lus la gsal byas nas //
T02D1856:41b-12: de nas lus nang thams cad gsal bar byas nas kun du de nyid mtha' yas pas //
T02D1856:41b-13: so sor ba spu las byung 'od kyis de yis sna tshogs kun du gang byas te //
T02D1856:41b-14: slar yang de nyid du ni thim ste ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:41b-15: yang na rang gi phyag mtshan phra mo gsal ba sna rtse ra gnas par bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:41b-16: nang du thub pa'i dkyil 'khor snying rje can gyis nyin mtshan dam pa'i shes rab ldan //
T02D1856:41b-17: brtan pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas spro ba de yi 'od zer thub dbang las byung dang //
T02D1856:41b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs phyag mtshan rnams kyang yang dang yang du blo dang ldan par bya //
T02D1856:41b-19: bsdu ba bsngo dang smon lam rnams ni sngon du bya //
T02D1856:41b-20: langs nas dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha yi rnam pa 'dzin pa'i sems ldan pa //
T02D1856:41b-21: yul las gsal ba la gnas gong ma bzhin du yongs su bsgoms nas yul rnams kyang //
T02D1856:41b-22: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjer gyur pa go rims rang gi rang bzhin dag pa yis //
T02D1856:41b-23: chos nyid kyis ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur gzhan dang gzhan du dbyer med chos //
T02D1856:41b-24: thams cad bya ba bya'o phyin ci log pa'i rtog pa las ni grol ba yi //
T02D1856:41b-25: thub pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'i mchog 'di dag gis rtag tu de yis so //
T02D1856:41b-26: bza' ba'i dus na snying ga ru ni gzhi yis bon rnams ni dmigs nas su //
T02D1856:41b-27: byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin kun du 'od zer 'bar ba bsam par bya //
T02D1856:41b-28: thams cad mnyam nyid dag pa'i bza' ba de nyid gsum gyi sngags ni gdab byas te //
T02D1856:42a-1: rdo rje la sogs lha rnams rab tu tshim par bya //
T02D1856:42a-2: phyi yi sbyin srog cho ga rjes su dpag tsam yid las byung ba'i sems nyid de //
T02D1856:42a-3: phung po la sogs bud shing bsregs nas ye shes me sbar ba ni bla med gsungs //
T02D1856:42a-4: de ltar thams cad 'dod pa rnams kyis bdag la rang rang lha yi gzugs nyid la //
T02D1856:42a-5: mchod par bya ba gzhan yang dam tshig der ni bde bar gshegs rnams 'dod pa yin //
T02D1856:42a-6: rjes su rig pa 'gro ba'i don dang bde gshegs kun la mchod pa yang byas te //
T02D1856:42a-7: lus la sogs pa'i las kyang de bzhin rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par bya ba yin //
T02D1856:42a-8: de 'dra'i rnam pa'i sems la 'ga' zhig lus ngag dngos kyi las ni gang yin pa //
T02D1856:42a-9: de dag thams cad phyag rgya'i sngags kyi rnam par sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa yin //
T02D1856:42a-10: gcig pu kho na'i gzhi la sna tshogs rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam pa de rnams ni //
T02D1856:42a-11: sdug bsngal bde ba grol ba bskyed pa las ni khyad par ci yi phyir //
T02D1856:42a-12: dge dang mi dge'i rnam pas lus la sogs pa sems kyi dbang gi phyir zhes gsungs //
T02D1856:42a-13: bde bas nyes pa thams cad spangs pa'i sems la nag po'i lus su gyur //
T02D1856:42a-14: dam tshig zad ma thag tu ji bzhin snying zlar bzhag pa'i rdo rje rgya gram sems //
T02D1856:42a-15: dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje'i sbyor bas rang bzhin rnam dag 'gro ba bsams nas ni //
T02D1856:42a-16: sna tshogs padma'i dbus su gong ma'i rim pas dbang bskur ba ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1856:42a-17: phyi yi khrus kyi cho gal yang rim pa 'di dag khyad par du ni bsam srid kyi //
T02D1856:42a-18: mtshams la'ang de bzhin mchod pa la sogs sngon du byas nas bzlas byas te //
T02D1856:42a-19: sems kyi nang du gnas pa'i 'khor los shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal bar bya //
T02D1856:42a-20: tho rangs langs pa'i dus na lha mo rnams kyi dbyangs kyis bskul nas dpal ldan pas //
T02D1856:42a-21: byas nas langs te thub pas bzlas pa la sogs gong ma'i cho ga nyid kyis bya //
T02D1856:42a-22: grub pa'i mtshan ma thob bas de nyid gsum gyi mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas zhi sems la //
T02D1856:42a-23: gong nas gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pas ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'grub //
T02D1856:42a-24: bdud rtsi zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni dbang bskur byas te nan tan dgra gzhom bya //
T02D1856:42a-25: gang zhig de yi dbus la gnas te gyur pa de ni de yi 'khor lo yin //
T02D1856:42b-0: sgyu ma rnam par rtog par gyur las @42b gzhan 'ga' 'ang srid pa'i sdug bsngal yod pa med //
T02D1856:42b-1: de dang mi mthun pa ni de dag sems dpa' mngon sum du ni byang chub shes par bya //
T02D1856:42b-2: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid de la gang yang snang ba ma yin rtog med pas //
T02D1856:42b-3: kun rdzob pa las lhag pa gzhan ni med do zhes te grub par sngar byas so //
T02D1856:42b-4: gang dag gang zhig mi mthun dus gcig 'gyur bde gsal mchog gyur ci yi phyir /
T02D1856:42b-5: mthong ba goms pa 'phel ba'i phyir na rang gi mi mthun gtan du 'gag pa yin //
T02D1856:42b-6: rgyu yi gzhi yi ngo bo rnams la bdag med ldan yang sben la sogs pa ni //
T02D1856:42b-7: 'gog pa ma yin ci'i phyir bden yang de las log par mi byed do //
T02D1856:42b-8: de ltar shes nas snying rje ldan pas rdzogs chen ye shes rab tu 'grub pa'i sems //
T02D1856:42b-9: dpal ldan kun du bzang po gzhi yi dngos po gang gis bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02D1856:42b-10: dri med blo gros 'od zer gyis ni mun pa thams cad spong bar byed rnams kyis //
T02D1856:42b-11: rnam par mdzad la de ni bdag 'dra'i go skabs ga la yin te gzhag par bya //
T02D1856:42b-12: skye bo bla ma'i 'dod pa gang la 'ga' zhig dang por de ni gzung byas nas //
T02D1856:42b-13: bcings pa grol 'dod ci yi phyir na de'i phyir bdag gis sems khral 'di byas so //
T02D1856:42b-14: de ltar byas pa las byung dge ba dri med gang yin de yis 'gro yid ni //
T02D1856:42b-15: sangs rgyas ye shes mgon po de la gnas pa'i
T02D1856:42b-16: go 'phang rtag tu bsam gyur cig / bsnyen bsgrub
T02D1856:42b-17: yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun du bzang mo
T02D1856:42b-18: zhes bya ba / dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon
T02D1856:42b-19: sangs rgyas dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
